Login.Title: Please use the form to sign-in Koton network

Errors.WrongEmail: You entered an invalid e-mail address.

Login.success: Login successful. You are being redirected

EmptyPage.title: Empty Page
EmptyPage.des: This is your empty page template to start building beautiful applications.

cookieBanner.text: We use cookies to improve your experience.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Welcome to our Privacy Policy. Your privacy is important to us. This document explains how we collect, store, and use your personal data.

necessary.title: Necessary
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.
necessary.XSRF-TOKEN: Used for security purposes to prevent cross-site request forgery.
necessary.session_id: Maintains the user's session state across page requests.
necessary.remember_me: Stores login preferences to keep the user signed in.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: These cookies help us analyze website usage and traffic patterns.
analytics._gid: Stores session information for statistical analysis.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: These cookies are used for personalized ads and to measure ad performance.
marketing.fbp: Facebook pixel tracking cookie for ad campaigns.

functional.title: Functional
functional.description: These cookies enable advanced functionality and personal settings.
functional.dark_mode: Stores the user's dark mode preference.
functional.language: Stores the preferred language of the user.
